divs: Sighting DetailsI have along with colleagues witnessed quite a few over the last few months over east manchester. The light up and sometimes change direction arc like movement gettin faster then blinkin out. The only thing these things can be is some secret satalite military hardware maybe whatever they are they are NOT conventional. I suppose iam reporting a flap. Well no supppose IAM. Hope to be contacted by mufon asap. Someone needs to see these. They are bloody frequent. Needs some high tech gear to record it. And I would be glad to assist. This aint right. And I need to speak to someone in the know. Can't explian with blackberry text. Need to be verbal. Hope they ring.
Summary: I have along with different colleagues witnessed quite a few. over. the last few months iam reporting a flap and its very unerving. thankyou
trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Manchester
There were no other sightings in Manchester on or around August 14th 2012
